ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed golden mushroom soup

cookingTips: Brown chicken in butter first for better flavor development
Marsala wine adds richness; use quality wine for best taste
Simmer gently to allow flavors to meld without reducing sauce too much
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through browning chicken properly and how to balance wine and cream-based soup for an elegant dish.
